knxUltimateHueTemperatureSensor.mapping_info: Link the KNX group address that should emit the temperature value.
knxUltimateHueTemperatureSensor.behaviour_info: Configure how the sensor reads at startup and whether to expose the Node-RED output pin.
knxUltimateHueTemperatureSensor.output_info: No KNX gateway selected. When the Node-RED output pin is enabled, Hue temperature values are still emitted to your flow.
